item.title: Lean Agile Scotland: Sustainability
item.description: This post is all about sustainablity. And communication. And agile. Let me start from the beginning. I’m sat on the train, coming back from Lean Agile Scotland 2024 and I’m thinking about what I’ve heard, seen and done. The conference was great, and allowed for catching up with old and new friends, finding kindred spirits and having good food. Yes, the older you get, the more important the question of “where shall we eat?
